title: Jango's Anthem
description: In the crucible of the Zombie Apocalypse some people are destroyed while others survive, and even thrive. Jango has thrived.Follow Jango as he walks the Apocalypse Road in search of even the slightest balm of peace. He will show you the darkness and the depths of the human abyss, but he will also show you that even a monster can do good works and bring light into the darkness.A mad-man, a monster, a demon, and a savior; Jango is a hero for all of us. Without prejudice or bias, he brings out the best in the best of us, and he kills the worst of us. He is the TRUTH.-This book contains strong language and violence; Reader Discretion is Advised.
author: Cedric Nye
